description:
A spare cylinder for the BCA Float 2.0 Airbag System. This empty float cylinder can be transported as regular cargo rather than dangerous goods. Remember to refill it at your destination before use.

  • Compact size and light weight make it easy to carry
  • When deployed the cylinder activates a release of 3,000 psi of compressed air
  • Has attached pressure regulator and connectors for Float 2.0 Systems
  • Sold as an empty cylinder. Empty cylinders can be filled at BCA authorized depots
  • Compatible with BCA Float 2.0 Airbag systems only. Not compatible with BCA Float 1.0 Airbag systems
name: Backcountry Access Float 2.0 Cylinder (Empty)
